amendment.description: Relative to extension of authority for program of referral and counseling services for veterans at risk of homelessness who are transitioning from certain institutions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Hirono for Senator Sanders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2023 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Hirono for Senator Sanders.
